prompt: How can I troubleshoot issues with my mobile service?
response:
If you're experiencing issues with your mobile service, here are some steps you can take to troubleshoot and potentially improve your connection:


Use Phones Supporting Wi-Fi Calling, VoLTE, 5G, and 4G LTE Band Aggregation:

Ensure your phone supports these technologies, as they can significantly enhance your mobile experience.



Check Your SIM Card:

Make sure you are using a 4G LTE SIM card. If your SIM card is old and only supports 2G or 3G, you won't be able to access 4G LTE networks. You can replace your old SIM card for free at any Orange store.



Automatic Network Selection:

Set your phone to automatically select the best available network (2G, 3G, or 4G LTE). This allows your phone to choose the optimal network based on your location.



Create a Coverage Map at Home:

Identify areas in your home where the signal is strongest. You can use special apps to measure signal strength accurately and find the best spots for making calls or using mobile data.



Wi-Fi Calling:

If you have a weak mobile signal at home but a strong Wi-Fi connection, use Wi-Fi Calling to make calls over your home internet. This service is available on selected phone models and costs the same as regular calls in your plan.



By following these steps, you can improve your mobile service experience. If issues persist, you may want to contact Orange customer support for further assistance.

prompt: How can I trade in my old device for a new one?
response:
You can trade in your old device for a new one through Orange's phone buyback program. Here are the steps you can follow:
In Orange Stores:

Visit an Orange Store: Bring your old phone to an Orange store.
Consultation: A consultant will test and evaluate your phone for free.
Receive a Voucher: If you agree with the evaluation, you will receive a voucher of a certain value.
Use the Voucher: You can use this voucher to purchase a new smartphone or accessories from Orange. You can make the purchase immediately or within 60 days of receiving the voucher.

Online via Orange Recycling:

Visit Orange Recycling Website: Go to orangerecykling.pl.
Fill Out a Form: Complete a short form to describe the technical and visual condition of your phone and get an initial valuation.
Courier Pickup: If you decide to sell, a courier will pick up your phone for free.
Final Valuation: After the phone is verified by specialists, you will receive a final valuation via email.
Receive Payment: If you accept the final valuation, you will receive the payment via bank transfer. If not, the phone will be returned to you for free.

By trading in your old device, you contribute to environmental sustainability by ensuring proper recycling and reuse of electronic devices.

prompt: Are there any deals or promotions on new mobile devices?
response:
Orange offers a variety of deals and promotions on new mobile devices. Here are some highlights:


Smartphones with or without a subscription: Whether you're looking for a simple communication device, a versatile model at an affordable price, or a top-tier smartphone with the latest features, Orange has something for you. You can check out the available smartphones here.


Weekly and Sunday deals: Regularly visit Orange's website for phones at reduced prices. Discounts can reach up to several hundred PLN. You can find modern phones from well-known brands like Samsung, Xiaomi, Apple, and OPPO. Often, there are bundles available, such as a second smartphone at a lower price or wireless headphones as a gift.


Refurbished phones outlet: Orange also offers a sale of refurbished smartphones. These are used or brand-new devices with damaged packaging, restored to "like new" condition by a certified company. They come with a user manual, charger, and a 24-month warranty or a 12-month liability for defects.


Special offers for number porting: If you transfer your number to Orange online, you can get the first 3 months of subscription for free in Plans S, M, and L. More details can be found here.


Additional benefits in new plans: In Plan M, you get 140 GB for 12 months (then 70 GB), and in Plan L, you get 300 GB for 12 months (then 150 GB). After exhausting the package, you can use mobile internet without GB limits at speeds up to 1 Mb/s.


Weekly gifts for individual customers: Every week, you can receive gifts in the My Orange app. The Wednesdays with Orange program offers additional gigabytes for free or promotions on services.


For more details on the latest promotions and offers, you can visit the Orange website.

prompt: Can you tell me about the discounts and bonuses on my phone number?
response:
As a valued Orange customer, you can enjoy various discounts and bonuses. Here are some of the benefits you might be eligible for:
For Prepaid (Orange na kartę):

Bonus for Top-Ups: Each time you top up your account via the Orange Top-Up platform, you receive a bonus of 5 GB.
First Login Bonus: You can get an additional 20 GB for your first login to the Mój Orange app.
Monthly Gifts: On the first Wednesday of each month, you can receive gifts such as free services, free GB, or bonus funds on your account after topping up.

For Postpaid (Orange Flex):

Flexible Plans: Choose from plans with 30 GB, 45 GB, 80 GB, or 150 GB of data, all including unlimited calls, SMS, and MMS.
Social Pass: Use social media apps like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, TikTok, Pinterest, Messenger, WhatsApp, and Viber without using your data allowance.

For Long-Term Customers:

Contract Renewal Benefits: When you renew your contract, you may receive benefits such as monthly discounts, additional GB, or a month free for online purchases.
E-Invoice Discount: By opting for e-invoices and logging into your Mój Orange account at least once a month, you can reduce your monthly bill by 5 PLN.
Wednesday Promotions: Every Wednesday, find special offers in the Mój Orange app, such as discounts on devices, promotions on additional services, or free GB.

For more details, please visit the Orange website or log in to your Mój Orange account.

prompt: What internet plans are available?
response:
Orange offers a variety of internet plans to suit different needs. Here are the main options:
Home Fiber Internet
Orange provides high-speed fiber internet with the following speeds:

300 Mb/s download, 50 Mb/s upload
600 Mb/s download, 100 Mb/s upload
1 Gb/s download, 300 Mb/s upload
8 Gb/s download, 1 Gb/s upload (available in limited areas of Warsaw and Krakow)

Orange Fiber Pro 2.0
This plan offers a combined speed of up to 2 Gb/s across all devices, ideal for families and professionals who need high speeds on multiple devices simultaneously.
Mobile Internet
For those who prefer mobile internet, Orange offers various plans, including options for LTE routers. You can find more details and choose the best plan for you on the Orange website.
Internet and TV Packages
Orange also offers packages that combine internet with TV services, providing a seamless experience with high-speed internet and a wide range of TV channels.
For more information and to find the best plan for your needs, visit the Orange website.

prompt: How do I check my internet speed and usage?
response:
To check your internet speed, you can use the following methods:


Online Speed Test:

Visit the Speed test LTE Orange website. This tool allows you to measure the speed of both LTE and stationary internet connections. It provides information on ping (latency), download speed, and upload speed, along with graphs showing how the connection performs during various activities like browsing, watching videos online, or gaming.



Mobile Application:

You can also use mobile applications such as Internet Speed Test to measure your internet speed on your smartphone.



For checking your internet usage, you can typically log into your account on the Orange customer portal or use the Orange mobile app. This will provide detailed information about your data usage and remaining data allowance.
If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!

prompt: What is the process for upgrading my internet plan?
response:
To upgrade your internet plan with Orange, you can follow these steps:

Visit the Orange Website: Go to the Orange website and log in to your account.
Check Available Plans: Browse through the available internet plans to find one that suits your needs.
Select a Plan: Choose the plan you want to upgrade to.
Contact Customer Service: You can either call the Orange customer service at 510 100 100 or visit an Orange store to request the upgrade.
Confirm the Upgrade: Follow the instructions provided by the customer service representative to confirm your upgrade.

If you need further assistance, you can always reach out to Orange customer support through the Mój Orange portal at https://www.orange.pl/poradnik/.

prompt: Are there any data caps on internet plans?
response:
Yes, Orange has specific data caps on internet plans. Here are some key points:


Data Transfer Speeds: The speed of data transfer depends on the technology being used. For example:

5G (Aggregation with 4G LTE): Up to 370 Mb/s download and 45 Mb/s upload.
4G LTE (Aggregation): Up to 225 Mb/s download and 6 Mb/s upload.
3G (HSPA+DC): Up to 37 Mb/s download.
2G (EDGE): Up to 0.236 Mb/s download.



Data Caps and Throttling: If you exhaust your data package, the speed will be reduced to 64 kb/s until the end of the service period unless you purchase an additional data package.


Additional Data Packages: During the validity of the service, you may receive an SMS offering the purchase of an additional data package.


For more detailed information, you can refer to the specific terms and conditions of your plan or contact Orange customer service.

prompt: How can I upgrade to a 5G plan?
response:
To upgrade to a 5G plan with Orange, you need to follow these steps:


Ensure you are in the 5G coverage area: Check if your location is within the 5G network coverage using the Orange coverage map.


Have a 5G-compatible smartphone: Make sure your device supports 5G. You can check the specifications of your phone online or explore 5G phones available at Orange.


Choose a 5G plan: Select one of the Orange 5G plans. This could be one of the Mobile Plans, a package from Orange Love Extra or Premium, or a plan in Orange Flex. For business users, the Mobile Plan L or Firmowy XL is suitable.


Use a compatible SIM card: Ensure you have a 4G LTE (USIM) or eSIM card, which is also compatible with 5G.


If you need further assistance, you can visit the Orange website or contact customer support.

prompt: What is the policy for equipment replacement?
response: When purchasing electronic equipment from Orange, you can return used equipment of the same type at the point of sale or delivery location free of charge. Additionally, small used equipment (with no external dimension exceeding 25 cm) can be left free of charge at any large retail store (with an area of at least 400 m²) that distributes electronic equipment, even without purchasing new equipment.

prompt: How can I add premium channels to my TV plan?
response:
Adding premium channels to your Orange TV plan is simple and convenient. You can do it directly from your decoder. Here’s how:

Access the Main Menu: Navigate to the main menu on your decoder.
Select the Desired Channel: Find the channel you want to add.
Order the Package: Follow the on-screen instructions to order the package.

You can also add premium channels from the location where the channel is available. Many premium packages, such as HBO with HBO Max or sports packages like Eleven Sports, can be activated at any time during your contract. Additionally, some packages are available for free for the first month or without extra charges if you have Orange Love Extra or Premium.
For more details, you can visit the Orange TV packages page.

prompt: Are there any current promotions for TV services?

Orange VOD: As an Orange customer, you have access to Orange VOD, which includes hundreds of movies and cartoons.


Multiroom Service: If you have multiple TVs at home, you can order the Multiroom service and enjoy entertainment with your family using the new 4K Stream decoder.

For the latest promotions and to explore more options, you can visit the Orange TV and Internet Packages page or check the "Offer for You" section in the My Orange app.

prompt: Can I record shows and movies with Orange TV services?

prompt: How can I troubleshoot issues with my TV service?
response:
To troubleshoot issues with your Orange TV service, you can follow these steps:


Check Your Internet Connection: Ensure that your internet connection is stable and working properly, as Orange TV relies on an internet connection to stream content.


Restart Your Devices: Sometimes, simply restarting your modem and decoder can resolve many issues. Unplug them, wait for a few seconds, and then plug them back in.


Verify Connections: Make sure all cables are securely connected to your modem and decoder. Loose or damaged cables can cause connectivity issues.


Update Firmware: Ensure that your modem and decoder have the latest firmware updates installed. This can often resolve compatibility and performance issues.


Check for Service Outages: Visit the Orange website or contact customer support to check if there are any known service outages in your area.


Reset to Factory Settings: If all else fails, you can try resetting your decoder to factory settings. Be aware that this will erase all your settings and preferences.


If you continue to experience issues, please contact Orange customer support for further assistance.

prompt: How can I view and pay my bill online?
response:
To view and pay your bill online with Orange, you can follow these steps:

Log in to your account: Visit the Orange website and log in to your account using your credentials.
Access your billing information: Once logged in, navigate to the billing section where you can view your current and past bills.
Choose a payment method: You can pay your bill using various methods such as:

Credit or debit card: Enter your card details to make a payment.
Bank transfer: Follow the instructions to complete a bank transfer.
Pay with Orange: If you have a prepaid account, you can use the funds available on your prepaid card.



For more detailed instructions, you can visit the Orange website or contact customer support for assistance.

prompt: What payment methods are accepted by Orange?
response:
Orange offers several convenient payment methods for online transactions:


Payment by Card: You can use a debit or credit card (VISA or Mastercard) to make payments online. This method involves entering your card details and confirming the payment through a secure process.


BLIK: This is a popular method in Poland, where you generate a 6-digit code in your banking app and enter it on the payment page. You then confirm the payment in your banking app.


Online Bank Transfer: You can choose your bank from a list, log in to your online banking, and confirm the payment. The necessary details are automatically filled in for you.


Payment via Operator: If you have an Orange subscription or a prepaid account, you can charge the payment to your Orange bill or use the funds on your prepaid account. This method is confirmed via an SMS code.


These methods ensure that you can pay quickly, securely, and conveniently for various services and subscriptions.

prompt: How can I set up automatic payments?
response:
To set up automatic payments with Orange, you can follow these steps:

Log in to your Orange account: Access your account through the Orange website or the My Orange app.
Navigate to the payment settings: Look for the section related to billing or payments.
Select automatic payments: Choose the option to set up automatic payments.
Enter your payment details: Provide the necessary information, such as your bank account or card details.
Confirm and save: Review the information and confirm to enable automatic payments.

For more detailed instructions or assistance, you can visit the Orange support page or contact customer service directly.

prompt: What should I do if I have a billing dispute?
response:
If you have a billing dispute, you can follow these steps to resolve it:


Contact Customer Support: Reach out to Orange customer support through the Mój Orange portal or by visiting an Orange store. You can also call the Orange helpline for assistance.


Provide Details: Be ready to provide all relevant details about the dispute, including your account information, the specific charges in question, and any supporting documentation.


Follow Up: If necessary, follow up on your dispute to ensure it is being addressed. Keep records of all communications and responses from Orange.


For more detailed assistance, you can visit the Mój Orange portal at https://www.orange.pl/poradnik/.
If you need further help, I can raise a ticket for you. Would you like me to do that?

prompt: What happens if I want to cancel my subscription?
response: If you want to cancel your Boosteroid subscription, you need to do so on your Boosteroid account at least 2 days before the subscription's expiration date. The subscription is automatically renewed, and the next payment is taken without prior notice. If the subscription has been activated and used, there is no possibility of a refund.

prompt: How can I report issues with Orange service?
response:
If you encounter any issues with Orange services, you have several options to report them:


Facebook: You can visit the Orange Polska fanpage on Facebook, where you can get help, top up your account, and watch video instructions from Orange Experts. The average time to resolve an issue posted on the Orange Polska profile is about 7 minutes.


Portal Orange.pl: On the Orange.pl portal, you can use the "Pomoc Orange" section, where you have access to a "doradca oferty" (offer advisor) who can propose the best solution for you within a few minutes. You can also use the contact form to report your problem or check your payment status and tariff plan in the "zrób to sam" (do it yourself) section.


Virtual Advisor and Experts via Video Chat: You can get assistance from the Virtual Advisor or experts through a video chat, where the resolution time is approximately 8 minutes.


Application "daj mi radę": Join the community in the "daj mi radę" application to seek answers to your questions.


YouTube: Check out the "pomoc Orange" channel on YouTube for short instructional videos explaining how Orange services work.


Technical Support Forum: Visit the "forum pomocy technicznej" on the Orange.pl portal, which has over 13 million views and 48,000 responses to various threads.


In-Person: Visit one of the Orange salons, where consultants can advise you on offers and help resolve your issues.


Hotline: Call the Orange hotline, which operates 24/7, to get answers to your questions and assistance from specialists. The calls to this number are free of charge.


For more detailed assistance, you can always reach out to Orange customer support directly through the Mój Orange portal at https://www.orange.pl/poradnik/.

Online Portal: Visit orange.pl for the latest information on offers and promotions.
Facebook: Reach out to the Orange Polska team on their Facebook page, where you can get help, top up your account, and watch video instructions from Orange Experts.
Mój Orange App: Download the "Mój Orange" app, which is used by over 44,000 customers monthly.
Technical Support Forum: Participate in the "forum pomocy technicznej" on the Orange portal, which has over 13 million views and 48,000 responses to various queries.
Infolines: Orange's infolines operate 24/7, allowing you to get answers to your questions at any time.

For more detailed assistance, you can also use the contact form available on the Orange website or engage with the Virtual Advisor and experts via video chat.

prompt: What is the process for referring a friend to Orange and saving money?
response:
If you or your friend are considering switching to Orange, there's a special offer available for those who transfer their number to Orange. Here are the details:

Transfer your number to Orange online and get free months of subscription. By ordering online, you can get the first 3 months of subscription for free in Plans S, M, and L.

For more information about this promotion, you can visit the promotion page for transferring numbers.
This is a great way to save money and enjoy the benefits of Orange's services!

prompt: How can I escalate an issue if it's not resolved?
response: If you have an issue that hasn't been resolved, you can escalate it by contacting Orange customer support directly. You can reach out through the Mój Orange portal at https://www.orange.pl/poradnik/. If you need further assistance, I can also help raise a ticket for you. Would you like me to do that?

prompt: How can I check the last five payments I made through SMS?
response:
To check the last five payments you made through SMS, you can follow these steps:

Log in to your Orange account: Visit the Orange website or use the Orange mobile app to log in to your account.
Navigate to your billing section: Once logged in, go to the section where you can view your billing details and payment history.
Check your payment history: Look for the option to view your recent payments or payment history. This should show you the details of your last five payments made through SMS.

If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, please contact Orange customer support through the Mój Orange portal at https://www.orange.pl/poradnik/.

prompt: Which are the international roaming operators you support?
response: Orange offers advantageous roaming packages for countries outside the European Union. These packages help reduce the costs of mobile calls, texts, and data usage while traveling abroad. For more details on specific packages and operators, please visit the Orange website or contact customer support directly.

prompt: Can I switch from a prepaid card to a subscription plan?
response: Yes, you can switch from a prepaid card to a subscription plan with Orange. Orange offers a variety of subscription plans that you can choose from based on your needs. You can manage this transition easily through the Mój Orange app or by visiting the Orange website. If you need further assistance, feel free to contact Orange customer support.

prompt: What languages do you support?
response: I can understand and respond in multiple languages, including but not limited to English, Polish, Spanish, German, and French. If you have any specific queries related to Orange services, feel free to ask in your preferred language!

prompt: Can I change the subscription in between?
response:
Yes, you can change your subscription in between. If you are using Orange Flex, you can change your plan once during the monthly billing period. If you choose a plan with a higher data package, you can start using it immediately. If you switch to a lower package, it will be available from the next billing period, and the new rate will be charged in the following month.
For other types of subscriptions, you can usually change your plan before the end of your current contract. You will receive information about this possibility in a message from Orange or you can find it in the Mój Orange app.

prompt: What are the cancellation charges for this subscription?
response: To provide you with accurate information, could you please specify which subscription you are referring to? Orange offers various services, and the cancellation charges may vary depending on the specific service or plan.

prompt: Which one of the plans is suitable for all-purpose everyday use with moderate data consumption?
response:
For all-purpose everyday use with moderate data consumption, the Internet Mobilny Optymalny plan from Orange would be a suitable choice. This plan offers 50 GB of data, which should be sufficient for typical activities such as browsing, streaming, and occasional downloads.
If you find that you need more data, you might consider the Internet Domowy 4G plan, which provides 250 GB + an additional 250 GB for 24 months under a promotional offer. This plan is ideal if you have higher data needs or multiple devices connected to the internet.

prompt: Can I use Orange on my smart fridge?
response:
While Orange services are primarily designed for smartphones, tablets, and computers, you might be able to access some Orange applications and services on your smart fridge if it supports Android or iOS apps. For example, you could try using the Mój Orange app to manage your account or the Orange TV Go app to watch TV if your smart fridge supports app installations from Google Play or the App Store.
For more specific information, you can always check the compatibility of your smart fridge with these apps or contact Orange customer support for further assistance.

prompt: Can I delete someone else’s account?
response: No, you cannot delete someone else's account. If you are experiencing issues with another user's account, such as cyberbullying or inappropriate content, you should report it to the platform's administrator or use the appropriate reporting tools provided by the service. If you need further assistance, please contact Orange customer support.

prompt: How do I transfer my subscription to a non-existing account?
response:
To transfer your number to Orange, you can follow these steps:


Visit the Orange Website: Go to the Orange website and find the online forms for transferring your number to either Orange on a prepaid plan or Orange on a subscription plan.


Provide Your Phone Number: Enter the phone number you wish to transfer. You will receive a verification code via SMS, which you need to enter on the website to confirm that you are the owner of the number.


Fill Out the Online Form: Complete the online form with the necessary details required to sign a new contract. Ensure that the information you provide matches the details with your current operator.


Choose the Transfer Date: Specify the date for the number transfer. You can choose:

The date when your current promotional period ends.
A specific date of your choice.
A date that respects the notice period of your current contract.



Receive Documents and SIM Card: After submitting the form, a courier will deliver the necessary documents for you to sign, including the number transfer request and the new service contract with Orange. You will also receive a temporary SIM card to use until your number is transferred.


Complete the Transfer: Sign the documents and return them to the courier. Orange will handle the rest of the process, including notifying your current operator and completing the transfer.


For more details, you can visit the Orange website and check the specific instructions and offers available for transferring your number.

prompt: Can I get a Orange subscription for free?
response:
Orange offers a special promotion for those transferring their number to Orange. By transferring your number online, you can get the first 3 months of your subscription for free in Plans S, M, and L.
For more details, you can visit the promotion page for transferring your number.

prompt: Can I get the Refer a Friend offer if I'm not an existing customer?
response:
If you or your friend are considering switching to Orange, there's a special offer available for those transferring their number. By transferring your number to Orange online, you can benefit from free months of subscription. Specifically, you can get the first 3 months of subscription for free in Plans S, M, and L.
For more details, you can visit the promotion page for transferring numbers.
Additionally, even if you are not currently an Orange customer, you can still purchase smartphones at great prices. Check out the available smartphones here.
For more information on the benefits and offers available, you can explore the Orange website or contact customer support.

prompt: Can I get a refund for services I never used?
response:
Yes, you can get a refund for services you never used under certain conditions. According to the provided information:


Right to Withdraw: If you entered into a contract remotely or outside the company's premises, you have the right to withdraw from it within 10 days in writing. In this case, no service fees will be charged, and you will revert to the services you used before signing the contract.


Try&Buy Offer: For some services, Orange offers a trial period (Try&Buy). You can try the service and cancel it within the specified regulatory period without incurring any financial consequences.


Refund for Unused Services: If you did not use the service due to reasons attributable to Orange (e.g., technical issues), the money paid for the service will be refunded.


For more specific details or to initiate a refund, please contact Orange customer support directly.

prompt: Can I get the ‘Ultimate Free Everything’ plan?
response: Please select a service typeRoaming DataSIM CardTalk and Text Add-onVoicemailTravel Data

prompt: I cannot text, can you help?
response:
I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with texting. Let's try a few steps to resolve the issue:

Restart Your Phone: Sometimes, a simple restart can fix many issues.
Check Signal Strength: Ensure you have a good signal. Poor reception can affect texting.
Update Your Messaging App: Make sure your messaging app is up to date.
Clear App Cache: Go to your phone's settings, find the messaging app, and clear its cache.
Check for System Updates: Ensure your phone's operating system is up to date.

If these steps don't resolve the issue, I can raise a ticket for further assistance. Would you like me to do that?

prompt: Do you offer services in India?
response: I'm sorry, but I can only assist with Orange-related queries in Poland. For other inquiries, please contact support@orange.pl.

prompt: What is the cheapest plan with iPhone?
response:
The cheapest plan in Orange for new users is the Plan XS. Here are the details:

5 GB mobile internet
Unlimited calls, SMS, and MMS in Poland and EU countries
Access to 5G network
Option to add CyberOchrona for enhanced internet security
Basic Netflix plan included for 29 PLN per month

You can choose to get this plan with or without a phone. In the Orange store, you will find a variety of smartphones, including popular brands like Apple, Samsung, and Xiaomi. You can also purchase other devices such as smart bands, electric vehicles, or drones with your plan.
For more details, you can visit the Orange subscription page.

prompt: Can I use Orange without a SIM card?
response:
Yes, you can use Orange without a physical SIM card by opting for an eSIM. Orange Flex offers a fully virtual SIM card, known as eSIM, which you can activate directly from the Orange Flex app without waiting for a courier. The eSIM functions just like a physical SIM card but is entirely digital.
To get started, simply download the Orange Flex app, register, and activate the eSIM on your compatible device. This allows you to make calls, send SMS, and use mobile data without needing a physical SIM card.
For more details, you can visit the Orange Flex eSIM page.
